decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to utilize the combo between Underworld Breach and Emry, Lurker of the Loch to generate infinite mana and recycle spells from the graveyard. By using cards like Grinding Station and Mishra's Bauble, the deck can further fuel this combo and enable the player to repeatedly cast spells. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Teferi, Time Raveler and Spell Pierce to control the game and protect the combo. Additionally, cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Thassa's Oracle provide alternate win conditions.
